Html:
Hope someone can help me with this.

I ran 05featuredemo.php and got an .xlsx file. I then edited the 05featuredemo.xlsx file and added a line of code to the second worksheet named 'terms and conditions'. I added "=Invoice.E11" and i get this error after I save it and run 07reader.php:

My main concern is that when I actually try this type of reference for an important .xls file that I want to work on, useing this line of code '=Cover.C7' I get an error like this:

 

Notice: Undefined offset: 12 in /var/www/xacute/excel/Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 839

Hope this makes sense. Would love some input or feedback on this :) Thank in advance.
